Summary: was looking up at saturn when a bright ball of light appeared and flew overhead
trends: There has been one other sighting in Orangedale
There were no other sightings in Orangedale on or around August 8th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and the girlfriend were just getting ready for dinner,when i decided to go outside and look up into the sky with my sky watch application(cellphone app)and pin pointed saturn and mars on my phone,when i see a bright ball of light appear overhead,just like someone switched on a flashlight,and it flew directly over me,when i called my girlfriend out to watch.she came out and we watched it dissapear over the tree tops.Its description was a bright yellow,almost like a bright white light.it was probably 40-50 feet in diameter or more.it gave off no sound what so ever,was errily quiet.it pulsated bright white.it seemed to affect everyone as my mother who was asleep had a night mare and woke up,my father heard knocking in the living room.and the dogs ran after something in the wood.so all these things happened at once along with us sighting the ufo,so thats why im posting.just seems like they are all connected but,i dont know,seems to strange to me......................will post more if anything else happens thanks
